version_description:
• Simplified store picker list
• Account tab for existing members to manage more aspects of their member profile
• Card details can now be securely saved for future checkouts
Fixed an issue preventing stores from being found in order to place advanced orders before they opened.

• Improved item search functionality for the selected store
• Various minor bug fixes
Changes to address bugs where a store might be erroneously shown as having no delivery or collection slots available from the start screen search.

• Fixed the product title sometimes not being fully visible in the menu grid screen when the 'was' price is displayed
• Fixed an occasional intermittent crash on the basket and order confirmation screen

• Fix for order item line quantity and prices shown as crossed out even when not refunded or substituted in the previous orders screens
• New order date and time selection/reservation functionality for those stores with date dependent promotions
